anya-e0806n0:15_0: Icceva manavasesa mattano bhayādyūpaddavopaghābhakarasāmatthiya yogena sakalajjhattikabāhiyantarāya nivāraṇa
anya-e0806n0:15_1: madhippetasiddhi visesa mabhikaṅkhiya ratanattaya visayabhūtaṁ taṁsādhane kantanidāna bhūtassa ālokiyayātisayaguṇavisesayuttassa
anya-e0806n0:15_2: mahato pyatimahanīyassa ratanattayassa sappasādānurūpaṁ pūjāvisayaṁ tadanussa(raṇaṁ katvā) gurusanniyogamanuṭṭhātuṁ–
anya-e0806n0:18_0: Vacanato attano gurupūjā purassaraṁ pañcikāvivaraṇaṁ pathi’yā pañcikā’tiādinā katapaṭiññattā sampati
anya-e0806n0:19_0: Nanu ca vuttiganthassa vaṇṇanāyaṁ katābhiniveso-yamācariyoti kathamihānadhikate mahādayotiādike paṭipannoti
anya-e0806n0:19_3: Tattha ratanattayappaṇāma karaṇaṁ antarāyakarāpuññavighātakarapuññavisesuppādanena kattu micchitassa ganthassa anantarāyenaṁ parisamāpanatthaṁ.
anya-e0806n0:19_4: Vacīpaṇāmo panettha sotūnampi yathāvuttatthanipphādanako ācariyenāpyaya mattho dassitoyeva’tattha ratanattayappaṇāmasandassana’ntiādinā,
anya-e0806n0:19_5: vācasikasatthādhikāratopi vacīpaṇāmoti kāyappaṇāmo manopaṇāmo ca. Na kato,
anya-e0806n0:19_9: abhidheyyasaṅkhātayayojanasandassanaṁ vīmaṁsāpubbakārīnaṁ payojano pālambhapubbikā satthe pavattatīti
anya-e0806n0:20_0: Sabbasseva hi satthassa, kammassāpi ca kassaci;
anya-e0806n0:22_0: Nanu satthappayojanānaṁ sambandhopi vattabbo idamassa payojananti yato–
anya-e0806n0:27_0: Taṁ vuttantogadhattā na, bhinno vutto payojanāti.
anya-e0806n0:28_0: Payojanappayojanampana sāmatthiyaladdhabbaṁ sayamācariyena ‘‘ko pana saddalakkhaṇassa ajānane doso’’tiādinā vuttanayena viññātabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n0:29_3: ‘saṅkhepanayenā’tica ‘sārabhūtaṁ vipulatthagā hiṁ anākula’nti ca imehi ganthārambhaphalaṁ sotujanasamussāhanañca,
anya-e0806n0:29_4: abhidheyyasaṅkhātappayojanampana‘saṁvaṇṇana’nti iminā dassitaṁ anvattha byapadesena saṁvaṇṇīyati vivaritvā
anya-e0806n0:29_5: vitthāretvā kathīyati attho etāyāti saṁvaṇṇanābhi katvā,
anya-e0806n0:29_6: tampana vivaritvā kathanaṁ saddānusāsanasatthasannissayattā abhidheyyo nāma samuditena satthena vacanīyattho
anya-e0806n0:30_0: Ayampanettha avayavattho-yoti aniyamavacanaṁ dhammarājasaddā pekkhāya cettha pulliṅgatā,
anya-e0806n0:30_2: dayati dukkhaṁ apanetvā paresaṁ sukhaṁ dadāti,
anya-e0806n0:30_3: dayīyati vā sappurisehi gamiya(ti sa) santāne pavattīyati,
anya-e0806n0:30_5: dayati vā paradukkhaṁ gaṇhāti taṁvasena attano hadayakhedaṁ karotīti dayā,
anya-e0806n0:30_7: visayamahantatāya mahatī pasatthā vā dayā assāti mahādayo,
anya-e0806n0:30_10: iminā khīṇāsavāpi saṅgayhanti tesampi diṭṭhadhammikasukhavihārasaṅkhāta hitassa dānato,
anya-e0806n0:30_11: janānaṁ samūho janatā tassā hitāya abhivaḍḍhiyā sakalavaṭṭa dukkhanissaṭanibbānasukhabhāgiyakaraṇāyāti vuttaṁ hoti,
anya-e0806n0:30_13: sambodhīti ettha saṁsaddo sāmanti imamatthaṁ dīpeti,
anya-e0806n0:30_14: tasmā saṁsayameva anaññabodhito hutvā cattāri saccāni bujjhati paṭivijjhati etāyāti sambodhi,
anya-e0806n0:30_19: kinti dhammajātaṁ dhammasaddenettha pāramidhammā pañcamahāpariccāgādayo ca adhippetā,
anya-e0806n0:30_20: tepi hi attānaṁ dhārentaṁ dhārenti sambodhi sampāpanasāmatthiyayogena parepi dhārenti nāmāti dhammāti vuccanti,
anya-e0806n0:30_28: ‘‘kathannāmete accanta dussahavaṭṭadukkhopagate satte taṁmahādukkhā mocessāmī’’ti vaṭṭadukkhanissaraṇekahetutāya
anya-e0806n0:30_29: sammā pūrento vaḍḍhento vuḍḍhiṁ virūḷhaṁ vepullaṁ gamentoti vuttaṁ hoti,
anya-e0806n0:30_32: duṭṭhu khanati kāyikaṁ assādanti’dupubbā khanismā’ ‘‘kvī’’ti (5-4) kvi,
anya-e0806n0:30_37: tasmā anantaṁ rūpaṁ sabhāvo assāti anantarūpaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:30_45: kiṁ vuttaṁ hoti ‘‘aniṭṭhānubhavanasabhāvāyāpi dukkhavedanāya anubhavanasabhāvasāmaññena ajjhāsayasampattivisesayogā
anya-e0806n0:30_46: mahākāruṇikassa sukhena sadisatāpattihotīti dukkhampi samānaṁ taṁ sukhamiva vindī’’ti.
anya-e0806n0:30_48: athavā sukhamiva sukhaṁ vindanto viya anaññavindiyamapi tādisaṁ dukkhaṁ sakalalokahitāva hitamanatāya vindīti attho,
anya-e0806n0:30_50: akhinnaṁ parissamamappattaṁ rūpaṁ sabhāvo assāti viggaho.
anya-e0806n0:31_0: Taṁ dhammarājanti yoti aniyamaniddiṭṭhassa vuttaguṇavisesādhāra puggalassaniyamanavacanaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:31_2: attanā paṭividdhassa sāmibhāvena dhammassa rājā sāmīti vā,
anya-e0806n0:31_3: attanā paṭivijjhiyamāne dhamme paṭivijjhantova tattha rājati dippatīti vā,
anya-e0806n0:31_4: parūpakāravasena tadatthāyeva paṭipannattā paresaṁ dhammaṁ rājeti pakāsetīti vā dhammarājā,
anya-e0806n0:31_8: Tattha māro ca so vīrocāti māravīro jito vidtedhastabalo māravīro nāti jitamāravīro, taṁ,
anya-e0806n0:31_10: tathāpi vīrasaddasannidhānena devaputtamāre gahite taṁvijayā aññepi jitā eva nāma hontīti viññeyyaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:31_15: athavā sudhantañca taṁ suvaṇṇaṁ ceti samāse tassidanti ‘‘ṇo’’ti (4-34) ṇappaccaye ‘‘majjhe’’ti (4-126) majjhavuddhiyaṁ sudhantasovaṇṇaṁ paṭimārūpaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:33_0: Hetu phalaṁ parattho ca, sabbopi thutisaṅgaho;
anya-e0806n0:35_0: Vuttahetuphalasattopakāravasena buddharatanassa thutipubbakampaṇāmaṁ dassetvā idāni dhammarājena tenāpi
anya-e0806n0:35_1: pūjanīyassa dhammaratanassa nipaccakāraṁ dassetuṁ‘dhammañca mohandhatamappadhaṁsi’nti āha,
anya-e0806n0:35_2: tattha ca saddo ‘dhammañca namitvā’ti namassitvā (potthake) namassanakriyāya dhammaṁ sampiṇḍeti,
anya-e0806n0:35_9: taṁ padhaṁseti pakārena nāseti sīlenāti mohandhatamappadhaṁsī,
anya-e0806n0:35_10: pasaddassapakāsanatthaṁ hitvā pakāratthasseva gahaṇato pariyattiyā saha–
anya-e0806n0:37_0: Cattāri atha nibbānaṁ, dhammā lokuttarā navāti.
anya-e0806n0:38_4: tappahānasmiñhi vuccamāne tammukhenetaresampi pahānaṁ vuttameva hotīti.
anya-e0806n0:39_0: Evaṁ dhammaratanassa namakkāraṁ dassetvā idāni tadādhārabhūtasaṅgharatanaṁ namassituṁ ‘saṅghaṁ tathā saṅghaṭitaṁ guṇehī’ti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:39_5: saṁpubbato hanatismā kvimhi ‘‘kvimhi ghoparipaccasamo hī’’ti (5.100) hanassa gho,
anya-e0806n0:40_0: Cattāro ca paṭipannā, cattāro ca phaleṭhitā;
anya-e0806n0:42_0: Vuttaaṭṭhaariyapuggalā gayhanti, guṇehīti lokiyalokuttarehi sīlādiguṇehi, saṅghaṭitanti saṁhataṁ.
anya-e0806n0:43_1: paṇāmaṁ dassetvā idāni gantha kattādiyathāvuttatthopadassana pubbaṅgamamattanā samārabhitabbaṁ gantha
anya-e0806n0:43_4: etāya sattā ijjhanti iddhā vuddhā ukkaṁsagatā hontīti iddhi=iddhividhādayo lokiyā lokuttarā ca sā etesamatthīti iddhimanto,
anya-e0806n0:43_10: kiṁ vuttaṁ hoti- ‘‘etadaggaṁ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ iddhimantānaṁ yadidaṁ moggallāno’’ti
anya-e0806n0:43_11: bhagavatā iddhimantesu etadagge ṭhapito mahāmoggallānatthero nāma yo dutiyo aggasāvako…
anya-e0806n0:43_12: (tena samānanāmadheyyenāti) tamapadisanto-yamācariyo anuddhatabhāvena ujunākkamena nāmādikamavatvā vaṅkavuttiyā
anya-e0806n0:43_13: attano moggallānoti nāmaṁ mahāsāmiṭṭhānantarappattiṁ kālocitapaññā veyyattiyaṁ buddhasāsanopakāritādiñca
anya-e0806n0:43_20: suttaṁ(hi) ‘saddā (lakkhīyanti) sāsīyanti anusāsīyanti pakatippaccayādivibhāgakappanāya etenā’ti saddalakkhaṇanti
anya-e0806n0:43_21: ca ‘byākarīyanti saddanipphādanavasena kathīyanti etenā’ti byākaraṇanti ca vuccati,
anya-e0806n0:43_22: aparampana vutyādi tadupakaraṇabhāvena saddasatthaṁ saddalakkhaṇaṁ byākaraṇanti ca vuccatīti daṭṭhabbaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:44_1: saṅgahetvā saddavasena saṅkucitaṁ viya katvā khipanaṁ saṅkhepo,
anya-e0806n0:44_3: bhovāti yo saddasatthassa vuttiyā ca kattā so eva,
anya-e0806n0:44_5: samārabheyya sammā ārambhaṁ kareyya bahunnaṁ kriyākkhaṇānamādibhūtaṁ kriyākkhaṇamanutiṭṭheyya,
anya-e0806n0:44_8: pañcīyati vipañcīyati byattī karīyati vutti attho etāyāti vā,
anya-e0806n0:45_0: Evamattanā karaṇīyasatthampaṭijānitvā tadanantaraṁ ‘‘dve me bhikkhave paccayā sammādiṭṭhiyā uppādāya
anya-e0806n0:45_1: (katame dve) parato ca ghoso (ajjhattañca) yoniso manasikāro’’ti vacanato sammāsavanapaṭibaddhā sabbāpi
anya-e0806n0:45_2: sāsana (ppaṭi) sampattīti sāsanappaṭipattiyā byākaraṇassa mūlakāraṇattā taṁ savane sādhujane niyojento
anya-e0806n0:45_4: tattha tanti yasaddavirahepi adhikatattā saṁvaṇṇanaṁ parāmasati,
anya-e0806n0:45_8: byañjanānurūpañca atthaṁsallakkhetvā anaññamanā hutvā sakkaccaṁ suṇantūti attho suvaṇṇabhājane nikkhittasīhavasāviya
anya-e0806n0:45_13: tathāvidhā eva sappurisā sādhukaṁ sotukāmā hontīti,
anya-e0806n0:45_16: phegguttābhāvena apariccajanīyatāya sāro thiraṁ so attho byañjanañca assā atthīti sārā ca sā bhūtāca,
anya-e0806n0:45_17: atha vā lokiyalokuttaraguṇātisayasādhanekasādhanabhāvato seṭṭhaṭṭhena sārañca sā bhūtācāti sārabhūtā,
anya-e0806n0:45_19: attho pana nayaggāhitatāyapi sabbathā dassitoyevāti vipulaṁ atthaṁ gaṇhātīti vipulatthagāhī, taṁ,
anya-e0806n0:45_20: vidhīyamānavaṇṇanākkamavisesena byākulassa vaṇṇanākkamassa nirasanato natthi ākulaṁ kiñci assāti anākulaṁ, taṁ,
anya-e0806n0:45_21: iminā ca kaccāyanavuttivaṇṇanāsu na tathābhāvaṁ dasseti.
anya-e0806n0:46_0: Tadevamadhikatattāyevāyamācariyo ganthārambhe’mahādayo yo’tiādike paṭipajjitvā dāni attanā vaṇṇanīyassa
anya-e0806n0:46_7: ramayatī ra tayatī (potthake) ti (vā) ratanaṁ anappaccayena,
anya-e0806n0:46_8: athavā yaṁ loke cittīkatādikaṁ ratananti vuccati,
anya-e0806n0:49_3: avayavavinimmuttassa pana samudāyassa abhāvato tīṇi eva ratanāni vuccanti,
anya-e0806n0:49_10: yena ca yo paṭipādīyati so tassa attho hotīti,
anya-e0806n0:49_18: kāyamanomayenāpi puññāti sayappattiyā abhisamīhitatthasiddhi hotevāti codanaṁ manasi nidhāya vacīpaṇāmassa
anya-e0806n0:49_20: guṇasaddo ettha ‘‘sataguṇā dakkhiṇā pāṭikaṅkhā’’tiādīsu viya ānisaṁsaṭṭho,
anya-e0806n0:49_30: yathā te sotāro ratanattayassa paṇāmakaraṇena puññātisayappaṭilābhā anekānisaṁsātisayappaṭilābhānukūla
anya-e0806n0:49_35: adhigatā pattā aneke bahū ānisaṁsavisesā āyu vaṇṇasukhabalapaṭibhānādayo yesanti viggaho,
anya-e0806n0:49_36: visositā sukkhāpitā antarāyā bhayādayo ajjhattikā bāhiyā vā yesaṁ tathāvidhānaṁ sotūnaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:49_38: abhisamīhitassa anuṭṭhitassa kataniṭṭhitassa ganthassa avabodhoyeva phalaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:52_1: paratthe sampādite pana sakattho sampannova nāma siyāti manasi katvā āha- ‘etadevā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n0:52_2: Kāyamanosamācaraṇena sampajjamānañca vacīsamācaraṇena sampajjatevāti aneneva vākyena viññāyatīti avagantabbaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:52_3: buddhi pubbā yasmiṁ karaṇe taṁ buddhi pubbaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:52_5: abhidheyyassa adhigamo jānanaṁ pubbo yassa so abhidheyyādhigamapubbako ,
anya-e0806n0:52_7: ekadesadassane ‘‘samuddo diṭṭho’’ti viya ekadesepi samudāyavohāradassanato pacchima pādenāti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:52_13: sādhanassa cedaṁ sādhiyanti evamassedambhāvahetusabhāvo sambandhoti vuttaṁ hoti,
anya-e0806n0:56_0: Vuttaaṭṭhadhammasamannāgatena abhinīhārena samannāgatā hutvā yathāvutte pāramitādayo dhamme pūretvāti attho,
anya-e0806n0:56_4: tathāgatoti yathā sampati jātā te bhagavanto sattapadavītihārena gatā,
anya-e0806n0:56_9: satta padāni gantvāna disā vilokesīti idaṁ ‘‘dhammatā esā bhikkhave sampati jāto bodhisattā samehi pādehi
anya-e0806n0:56_10: patiṭṭhahitvā’’ti eva mādikāya pāḷiyā sattapadavītihārūpariṭhitassa sabbadisānuvilokanassa vuttattā vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:56_11: disā vilokesi samantatoti idampana ‘samehi pādehi phusī vasundhara’nti etassa anantaraṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ…
anya-e0806n0:59_3: evamādinātiādisaddena tesaṁ tesaṁ dhammānaṁ sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇaṁ tathaṁ āgato yathāvato adhigato’yegatyatthā te buddhyatthā,
anya-e0806n0:59_4: ye buddhyā te gatyatthā’titathāgatoti evamādiṁ saṅgaṇhāti,
anya-e0806n0:59_6: tathāgatabhāvoti tathāgatoti bhavanaṁ nipphatti namassanakiriyābhisambandhāti’namassitvā’ti ettha namassanakiriyāya
anya-e0806n0:59_8: namassanakiriyāvisesanattāti ‘namassitvā’ti namassanaṁ katvāti vuttaṁ nāma siyāti namassananti vuttanamassanakiriyāya visesanattā,
anya-e0806n0:59_12: mūleti mūlasamīpe ‘‘yāva majjhanhike kāle chāyā pharati nivāte paṇṇāni patanti etāvatā rukkhamūlaṁ’’tiādīsu viya,
anya-e0806n0:59_13: nanu aññepi khīṇāsavā ‘aggamaggene’ccādinā vakkhamāna nayena nipphannā evāti anuyogaṁ manasikatvā vuttaṁ ‘saheva vāsanāyā’ti,
anya-e0806n0:59_14: na hi bhagavantaṁ ṭhapetvā aññe saha vāsanāya kilese pahātuṁ sakkonti,
anya-e0806n0:59_15: etena aññehi asādhāraṇaṁ bhagavato arahattanti dasseti,
anya-e0806n0:59_16: teneva iddhasaddassa atthaṁ dassento’tepi hi’ccādikaṁ vakkhati,
anya-e0806n0:59_17: kāpanāyaṁ vāsanā nāma pahīnakilesassāpi appahīnakilesassa payogasadisapayogahetubhūto kilesanihito sāmatthiyaviseso’āyasmato
anya-e0806n0:59_22: sammuti upapattidevabhāvato aññena visuddhi devabhāvenātinipphannattā āha-‘visuddhidevabhāvenā’ti,
anya-e0806n0:59_23: sakalakilesakālussiyāpagamena visuddhippattiyā sabbaññuguṇā laṅkārena visuddhidevabhāvenāti attho.
anya-e0806n0:60_9: keci ‘siddho middhaguṇo assāti siddhamiddhaguṇanti duṭṭhamatthaṁ parikappetvā vākyamidaṁ dūsenti,
anya-e0806n0:60_10: te pana ‘middho nāma koci guṇo natthī’ti ca,
anya-e0806n0:60_11: ‘tathāgato nāma middha guṇo na hotī’ti ca,
anya-e0806n0:60_12: ‘tādiso ce siyā na ñāṇanissitapūjā pakatopayoginī bhavatī’ti ca ajānitvā vadatha tumhehi vatvā uyyojetabbā,
anya-e0806n0:60_15: dhammasaṅghānampīti iminā avayavena viggahepi samudāyassa samāsatthattā aññapadatthasamāsoyaṁ tagguṇasaṁviññāṇoti dīpeti,
anya-e0806n0:60_18: kiriyātisambandho vagamyate dhammasaṅghānaṁ guṇībhūtānampi tadavinābhāvittena namassanātisambandhā,
anya-e0806n0:60_20: puttena saha vattamānoti tagguṇasaṁviññāṇaaññapadatthasamāsattā tulyamubhinnampi āgamananti puttopi āgatoti patīyate,
anya-e0806n0:60_28: tañca yathārūpaṁ kilesasamucchindanatappaṭippassaddhi ālambanabhāvena hotīti āha- ‘so…pe…
anya-e0806n0:60_34: sīladiṭṭhisāmaññenāti ariyena sīlena ariyāya ca diṭṭhiyā samānabhāvena,
anya-e0806n0:60_36: tena te yatthakatthaci ṭhitāpi sahagatāvāti saṁhatoti imasmiṁ atthe saṅghoti padasiddhi daṭṭhabbā,
anya-e0806n0:60_38: lokiyasīladiṭṭhiyā sāmaññena saṁhatattā sammutisaṅghopi paṇāmārahoyevāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n0:61_1: yesamidaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ bhāsissanti paṭiññātanti āha-‘saddā ghaṭapaṭādayo’ti,
anya-e0806n0:61_4: ye lokasaṅketānurodhenātthappakāsakā tesaṁ sātthakāname vidaṁ lakkhaṇanti,
anya-e0806n0:61_5: apica ‘saddā ghaṭapaṭādayo’ti vadanto vedikānaṁ viya unti ñatthi (potthake) ādīnaṁ anupubbīniyamāvatthānamasambhavā
anya-e0806n0:61_6: tadanukkamena nipphādiyamānanampi saddānaṁ lokiyattānabhivattanañca bodhetīti daṭṭhabbaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:61_7: nu tattha pakāsakatthaṁ saddassa samudāyavasena vā siyā paccekavaṇṇavasena vā,
anya-e0806n0:61_14: tathā sati katha matthaṁ saddo pakāsayatīti ce kamena sotacittādigahitakkhara pāḷiyā ca yo saddoti viññeyyo sātthako cittagocaro,
anya-e0806n0:61_15: cittagocarassāpi saddassa pana bālajanappabodhāya kappanāmattena pakatyādivibhāgato,
anya-e0806n0:61_18: nanu goiccādisādhusaddaniyame sati gotādayo asādhu saddāti viññāyanti gantabbamagganiyame agantabbamaggo viya,
anya-e0806n0:61_19: gotādi asādhusaddaniyame vā goiccādayo saddā sādhavoti agantabbamagganiyame gantabbamaggo viya,
anya-e0806n0:61_25: magadhesu viditāti imasmiṁ atthe ‘‘aññasmi’’nti (4-121) māgadhānaṁ idanti atthe ‘‘ṇo’’ti (4-34) ṇappaccaye
anya-e0806n0:61_26: māgadhā māgadhanti ca padanipphatti veditabbāti dassetumāha- ‘magadhesmi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:61_27: magadhesu viditātiādino adhippāyaṁ vivaritumāha- ‘idaṁ vuttaṁ hotī’tiādi,
anya-e0806n0:61_30: lakkhaṇaṁ māgadhanti vadatā pakāsitaṁ hotīti attho,
anya-e0806n0:61_32: lakkhaṇaṁ visesayatāti saddalakkhaṇa saddassa uttarapadatthappadhānattā māgadhanti iminā lakkhaṇaṁ visesayatā byavacchedayatā vuttikārena,
anya-e0806n0:61_34: sadde ca visesito hotīti saddalakkhaṇasaddo māgadhe eva saddeeva (potthake) byavacchedito hoti,
anya-e0806n0:61_35: ayametthādhippāyo ‘magadhesu viditā māgadhāti sadde gahetvā tesamidaṁ māgadhanti māgadhasaddena yasmā saddalakkhaṇasadde lakkhaṇaṁ visesitaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:61_36: tasmā saddalakkhaṇasadde saddo yadi amāgadho kathaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ māgadhaṁ siyāti sāmatthiyā saddopi visesito hotī’ti,
anya-e0806n0:61_37: nanu māgadhanti lakkhaṇassa māgadha saddasambandhittajhāpanato saddalakkhaṇanti ettha saddasaddassa niratthaka tāpatti hotīti,
anya-e0806n0:61_38: na hoti gammamānatthassa saddassa payogampati kāmacārattā saddalakkhaṇasaddassa vā samāsatthe niruḷhattā
anya-e0806n0:61_40: kopanātiādisaddalakkhaṇanti iminā abhidheyyasaṅkhātapayojanassa dassitattā tappayojanapucchanaparā codanā,
anya-e0806n0:62_0: Piyo ca garu bhāvanīyo, vattā ca vacanakkhamo;
anya-e0806n0:64_0: Vuttehi tato parehi ca pasatthatarehi guṇavisesehi samupetaṁ guruṁ.
anya-e0806n0:67_4: so ‘dhammavinayesu kusalo na hotī’ti ettha daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0806n0:67_6: tattha dhammavinayesu suttantātābhidhammasaṅkhātesu dhammesu ceva vinaye ca, kasmā–
anya-e0806n0:68_0: Yo niruttiṁ na sikkheyya, sikkhanto piṭakattayaṁ;
anya-e0806n0:70_1: ayametthādhippāyo ‘‘yathā vuttanayena sambhūtapada byāmohavasena padatthepi byāmohasambhavato suttantopadassitāya
anya-e0806n0:70_2: diṭṭhiviniveṭṭhanāya ca abhidhammāgate nāmarūpaparicchede ca vinaya niddiṭṭhe saṁvarāsaṁvare ca akosallaṁ siyā’’ti,
anya-e0806n0:70_6: paṭipajjitumasakkontoti tatthatattheva vuttāsu adhisīla adhicitta adhipaññāsikkhāsu pavattituṁ asamattho,
anya-e0806n0:71_0: Yāva tiṭṭhanti suttantā, vinayo yāva dippati;
anya-e0806n0:72_0: Tāva dakkhanti ālokaṁ, sūriye abbhuggate yathāti.
anya-e0806n0:73_0: Paṭipattinti paṭipajjīyatīti paṭipattīti yathāvuttaṁ tividhampi paṭipattiṁ,
anya-e0806n0:73_2: nassati hi paṭipatti tesuyevā ko sallatamagatattā,
anya-e0806n0:75_0: Tamo bhavissati loke, sūriye atthaṅgate yathāti.
anya-e0806n0:76_1: yathāvuttā-nukkamapariccāgena anurūpapaṭipattiyā paṭilabhitabbattā adhigamavisayassa visathattā (potthake) yo gakkhemassa,
anya-e0806n0:77_0: Suttante rakkhite sante, paṭipatti hoti rakkhitā;
anya-e0806n0:78_0: Paṭipattiyaṁ ṭhito dhīro, yogakkhemā na dhaṁsatīti.
anya-e0806n0:79_0: Etāvatā aviññātasaddalakkhaṇassa sakatthaparihāniṁ dassetvā idāni sakatthasampattimūlikā paratthasampattīti
anya-e0806n0:79_1: tadabhāvā tādiso puggalo paresampi paccayo bhavituṁ na sakkotīti dassetuṁ ‘nacā’tiādi vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:79_3: tañcettha tesaṁ tesaṁ kula puttānaṁ dhammavinayasikkhāpanaṁ taṁtaṁ kammato nittharaṇādi ca,
anya-e0806n0:79_7: idha pana taṁ sādhanabhūto puggalo upacārato patiṭṭhāti gahetabbo,
anya-e0806n0:79_9: saddalakkhaṇaññūyevāti avadhāraṇampana tesu tabbidūyeva samatthoti dassanatthaṁ pakaraṇavasena vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:79_10: attano pana suguttasīlakkhandhavirahena kadāci koci yathāvuttānaṁ patiṭṭhābhavituṁ na sakkoti…
anya-e0806n0:79_12: teneva vinayadhare ānisaṁsaṁ dassentena bhagavatā tappadhānaṁ tappamukhaṁva katvā ‘‘pañcime bhikkhave ānisaṁsā vinayadhara puggale,
anya-e0806n0:79_13: katame pañca attano sīlakkhandho sugutto hoti su rakkhito,
anya-e0806n0:79_24: atha khoti vidho saddhammopi nāsitoyevāti vatthumāha ‘ajānanto panā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n0:79_25: ayathāpaṭipajjamānoti saddalakkhaṇaññunā yathā yena pakārena atthānurūpaṁ byañjane byañjanānurūpañca atthe paṭipajjitabbaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:79_31: terasa dhutaguṇā cuddasa khandhakavattāni dve asīti mahāvattānīti ayaṁ paṭipattisaddhammo nāma,
anya-e0806n0:79_32: cattāro maggā cattāri ca phalāni ayaṁ adhigamasaddhammo nāma,
anya-e0806n0:79_39: byañjīyati attho etenāti byañjanaṁ-vākyaṁ athavā pajjate gamyate attho etenāti padaṁ-syādyantādi,
anya-e0806n0:79_42: dunnikkhittaṁ duṭṭhu nikkhittaṁ ṭhapitaṁ virādhetvā kathitaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:79_43: attho ca dunnītoti dunnikkhittattāyeva padabyañjanassa tabbacanīyopi duṭṭhuviññāto hoti,
anya-e0806n0:79_46: na hi attāva attanā veditabboti yuttanti.
anya-e0806n0:80_0: Tadevantiādinā yathāvuttaṁ nigametvā saññāvidhāne payojanaṁ dasseti,
anya-e0806n0:80_2: yasmā saddalakkhaṇassa jānanaṁsāni saṁsaṁ tasmāti attho,
anya-e0806n0:80_7: Nanuca saññīnaṁ saññānaṁ vattabbatte ‘‘aādayo titālīsavaṇṇā’’tiādīnaṁ vākyānaṁ visuṁvisuṁ mahantattā
anya-e0806n0:80_8: kuto lāghavaṁ satthassāti maññamāno ‘tathāhi’ccādinā saññāvidhāne lāghavasabbhāvaṁ samattheti,
anya-e0806n0:80_9: hotevāti avadhāraṇena katthaci parasatthe viya no na hotīti dasseti,
anya-e0806n0:80_11: tathāhi ‘‘vaṇṇaparena savaṇṇopi’’ccādo (1-24) vaṇṇādisaññāsamuddharitā nāttānamattāvagametumalanti pare pucchitvā jānitabbā assa,
anya-e0806n0:80_13: tatossa saññāti saññāsaññīvivecanaṁ tadanuṭṭhānanti paramparāpekkhāya bhavitabbaṁ paṭipatti gāravābhāvā.
anya-e0806n0:80_17: visayo gocaro yatthete syādayo vidhī yante,
anya-e0806n0:80_19: paṭhamaṁ karīyatīti pakati yato syādayo vidhīyante,
anya-e0806n0:80_25: samānattantuṇādivuttiyā ‘‘rājādivisiṭṭhe purisā doviya’vasiṭṭhādivisiṭṭhe apaccādimhi atthe pavattanato.
